text: aur jo vyakti tumamen se svatantr eemaan vaaliyon se vivaah karane kee sakat na rakhe, to vah apane haathon mein aaee huee apanee eemaan vaalee daasiyon se (vivaah kar le). darasal, allaah tumhaare eemaan ko adhik jaanata hai. tum aapas mein ek hee ho[1]. atah tum unake svaamiyon kee anumati se un (daasiyon) se vivaah kar lo aur unhen niyamaanusaar unake mahar (vivaah upahaar) chuka do, ve satee hon, vyabhichaarinee na hon, na gupt premee bana rakhee hon. phir jab ve vivaahit ho jaayen, to yadi vyabhichaar kar jaayen, to unapar usaka aadha[2] dand hai, jo svatantr striyon par hai. ye (daasee se vivaah) usake lie hai, jo tumamen se vyabhichaar se darata ho aur sahan karo, to ye tumhaare lie adhik achchha hai aur allaah ati kshamaasheel dayaavaan hai
